briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety Study of Enzalutamide in Combination With Exemestane in Patients With Advanced Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A PHASE 2, RANDOMIZED, DOUBLE-BLIND, PLACEBO-CONTROLLED, MULTICENTER STUDY OF EFFICACY AND SAFETY OF ENZALUTAMIDE IN COMBINATION WITH EXEMESTANE IN PATIENTS WITH ADVANCED BREAST CANCER THAT IS ESTROGEN OR PROGESTERONE RECEPTOR-POSITIVE AND HER2-NORMAL
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Progression Free Survival (PFS): Intent-to-Treat (ITT) Population By Interactive Web Recognition System (IWRS)
